translations: 极微小；希腊语的第九个字母

sentences.sentence: I don't think that would help one iota.
He's never shown an iota of interest in any kind of work.
sentences.translation: 他对任何一种工作都没有表现出一点儿兴趣。

sentences.sentence: The future cardinal was convinced, even then, that he had not abandoned one iota of his Jewishness.
sentences.translation: 即使在那时，这位未来的红衣主教仍然坚信，他丝毫没有放弃自己的犹太身份。
